TopicTitle: Can't get a Mod to work (KW Rocketry V2.5.6B)

Articles.Content:

Ok now each time i try to install the KW rocketry, the game crash's when i try to start up the game, when it is loading everything

Edited January 24, 2014 by Firedtm
got it to work

that's weird, i can get KW to work no problems but cannot get B9 to work for the life of me....

Also +1 on the memory reduction mod suggestion, or download the individual reduced texture packs for kw and b9.
Try updating the ExsurgentEngineering and Firespitter DLL's for B9. Other than that, my game froze on loading the 2m fairing cone. Don't know why that happeneed.

Try the Active Memory Reduction mod.

Thank you that worked
Since OP's question has been answered and this thread is in the wrong sub-forum, it's closing time.
